verses.text_plain: I will bless the Lord at all times: his praise shall continually be in my mouth.
verses.verse_html:
1I will bless the Lord at all times: his praise shall continually be in my mouth. ▼
▼ Abimelech: or, Achish

verses.text_plain: My soul shall make her boast in the Lord: the humble shall hear thereof, and be glad.
verses.verse_html: 2My soul shall make her boast in the Lord: the humble shall hear thereof, and be glad.

verses.text_plain: O magnify the Lord with me, and let us exalt his name together.
verses.verse_html: 3O magnify the Lord with me, and let us exalt his name together.

tokens.text: with me, and let us exalt

verses.text_plain: I sought the Lord, and he heard me, and delivered me from all my fears.
verses.verse_html: 4I sought the Lord, and he heard me, and delivered me from all my fears.

verses.text_plain: They looked unto him, and were lightened: and their faces were not ashamed.
verses.verse_html:
5They looked unto him, and were lightened: and their faces were not ashamed. ▼
▼ were lightened: or, they flowed unto him

footnotes.body_text: ▼ were lightened: or, they flowed unto him
footnotes.body_html: ▼ were lightened: or, they flowed unto him

verses.text_plain: This poor man cried, and the Lord heard him, and saved him out of all his troubles.
verses.verse_html: 6This poor man cried, and the Lord heard him, and saved him out of all his troubles.

tokens.text: him out of all his troubles

verses.text_plain: The angel of the Lord encampeth round about them that fear him, and delivereth them.
verses.verse_html: 7The angel of the Lord encampeth round about them that fear him, and delivereth them.

verses.text_plain: O taste and see that the Lord is good: blessed is the man that trusteth in him.
verses.verse_html: 8O taste and see that the Lord is good: blessed is the man that trusteth in him.

verses.text_plain: O fear the Lord, ye his saints: for there is no want to them that fear him.
verses.verse_html: 9O fear the Lord, ye his saints: for there is no want to them that fear him.

verses.text_plain: The young lions do lack, and suffer hunger: but they that seek the Lord shall not want any good thing.
verses.verse_html: 10The young lions do lack, and suffer hunger: but they that seek the Lord shall not want any good thing.

verses.text_plain: Come, ye children, hearken unto me: I will teach you the fear of the Lord.
verses.verse_html: 11Come, ye children, hearken unto me: I will teach you the fear of the Lord.

verses.text_plain: What man is he that desireth life, and loveth many days, that he may see good?
verses.verse_html: 12What man is he that desireth life, and loveth many days, that he may see good?

verses.text_plain: Keep thy tongue from evil, and thy lips from speaking guile.
verses.verse_html: 13Keep thy tongue from evil, and thy lips from speaking guile.

verses.text_plain: Depart from evil, and do good; seek peace, and pursue it.
verses.verse_html: 14Depart from evil, and do good; seek peace, and pursue it.

verses.text_plain: The eyes of the Lord are upon the righteous, and his ears are open unto their cry.
verses.verse_html: 15The eyes of the Lord are upon the righteous, and his ears are open unto their cry.

verses.text_plain: The face of the Lord is against them that do evil, to cut off the remembrance of them from the earth.
verses.verse_html: 16The face of the Lord is against them that do evil, to cut off the remembrance of them from the earth.

verses.text_plain: The righteous cry, and the Lord heareth, and delivereth them out of all their troubles.
verses.verse_html: 17The righteous cry, and the Lord heareth, and delivereth them out of all their troubles.

tokens.text: them out of all their troubles

verses.text_plain: The Lord is nigh unto them that are of a broken heart; and saveth such as be of a contrite spirit.
verses.verse_html:
18The Lord is nigh unto them that are of a broken heart; and saveth such as be of a contrite spirit. ▼
▼ unto…: Heb. to the broken of heart
 , ▼
▼ of a contrite…: Heb. contrite of spirit

tokens.text: unto them that are of a broken
such as be of a contrite

footnotes.body_text: ▼ unto…: Heb. to the broken of heart
footnotes.body_html: ▼ unto…: Heb. to the broken of heart

footnotes.body_text: ▼ of a contrite…: Heb. contrite of spirit
footnotes.body_html: ▼ of a contrite…: Heb. contrite of spirit

verses.text_plain: Many are the afflictions of the righteous: but the Lord delivereth him out of them all.
verses.verse_html: 19Many are the afflictions of the righteous: but the Lord delivereth him out of them all.

verses.text_plain: He keepeth all his bones: not one of them is broken.
verses.verse_html: 20He keepeth all his bones: not one of them is broken.

verses.text_plain: Evil shall slay the wicked: and they that hate the righteous shall be desolate.
verses.verse_html:
21Evil shall slay the wicked: and they that hate the righteous shall be desolate. ▼
▼ desolate: or, guilty

verses.text_plain: The Lord redeemeth the soul of his servants: and none of them that trust in him shall be desolate.
verses.verse_html:
22The Lord redeemeth the soul of his servants: and none of them that trust in him shall be desolate. ▼
▼ desolate: or, guilty

tokens.text: and none of them that trust
